products.title: Petite Pavé Diamond Ring
products.description: This petite diamond ring features scalloped pavé diamonds in elegantly sculpted prongs that extend one half of the way around the band. It is a beautiful complement to many delicate engagement rings.

products.title: 9ct White Gold Illusion Set Cluster Twist Band Diamond Ring
products.description: The Bella Collection celebrates the beauty of true love. Inspired by the romantic design of vintage jewellery, this exquisite engagement ring is the perfect way to express your love…for years to come. Set in 9ct White Gold, this piece features 0.50ct of white, round brilliant diamonds in a fine pav? setting with antique millgrain detailing. The centre is further accentuated by a diamond halo…making this ring a little piece of heaven!

products.title: Women's · White Gold · Diamond
products.description: This collection is available in various diamond sizes. As the diamond grows the Protea setting blooms. Starting with a 0.25ct round brilliant cut diamond, the setting features four claws with closed Protea Petals. As the diamond reaches 0.50cts the setting blooms to 6 claws with closed Protea Petals. Once the diamond reaches 1ct or larger, the setting flourishes into 6 claws with open Protea Petals.

products.title: Women's · White Gold · Diamond
products.description: A striking balance between classic and organic, this ring looks gorgeous as a dainty Engagement ring or could make for a stunning anniversary gift to be treasured for a lifetime. products.title: Swarovski Infinity Y Necklace
products.description: This Y necklace from Swarovski is the perfect choice for classy chic everyday wear. The shiny rose gold chain flows through an infinity symbol with an abundance of sparkling elements. The eye-catcher at the end of the chain adds an extra dose of sparkle to the creation. This is a charming gift idea for many occasions. This necklace by Swarovski from the Swarovski Infinity collection is a carefully crafted piece of jewelry made of metal. The jewelry measures 34 cm and can be securely closed with drawstring, a carabiner. With the appealing design (infinity symbol) and details of Swarovski crystal, this necklace is a beautiful piece of jewelry that you do not want to take off so quickly. Also a nice gift idea for birthdays, milestones reached or as a generous surprise for a loved one.

products.title: Monica Vinader Doina Snake Chain Necklace in GP

This necklace features a heart-shaped red man-made crystal pendant that's fixed to a sterling silver chain adjustable to two lengths for versatile styling. The pendant is set in a basket hand-finished with a row of pavé along its sides, radiating love from every angle. A Pandora logo bar and small round cubic zirconia stone add extra sparkle to the closure.

products.title: Pandora Sterling Silver Chain Necklace 75cm
products.description: Create a look that’s uniquely you, using this classic chain as the starting point. The versatile necklace is cast in sterling silver, one of our three signature metals. It’s minimally detailed with a Pandora logo tag and a lobster clasp. Whether you want to do simple, wear a statement or play with texture and size, it’s an easy way to update your neckline. Add your edit of pendants or charms and adjust it to one of two lengths for the perfect drop.

Crafted from high-quality sterling silver and plated in 18k gold, this necklace is the perfect combination of style and quality. What sets this necklace apart is the off-centre diamante and the two different chains on either side give it a cool and unique vibe. Whether you're dressing up for a night out or adding a touch of glam to your everyday look, our Dual-Chain Diamante Necklace is the perfect accessory. It's fun, hip, and totally unforgettable – just like you!

This infinite tennis bracelet crafted of 925 Sterling Silver, paved 0.20 Carat stones, decorated with crystal zircon stones, let infinity speak to unconditional love in your life, where there is no end in sight. These exquisite hoop earrings are meticulously fashioned from premium 18k rose gold-plated brass and feature a latch back for utmost comfort. Measuring 25mm x 2.5mm, they strike the perfect balance between everyday wear and special occasions. What truly sets these hoop earrings apart is the dazzling brilliance exuded by the 34 Swarovski crystals gracing each earring.

products.title: Pandora Clear Sparkling Crown Stud Earrings - 298311CZ
products.description: Every good jewellery collection needs a pair of dressed-up studs that can easily make the transition from the office to a night out on the town and these Clear Sparkling Stud Earrings don’t disappoint. The setting of each stud resembles a crown and gives the earrings an extra level of detail that is certainly fit for a queen. Wear them alone or mix and match them with other studs, these crown stud earrings are an elegant piece that you'll never want to take off. Wear it to add a protective layer to your current collection or gift to someone you truly care about. Style your chosen earring with our delicate rings, necklaces or bracelets. products.title: Pandora Pave Heart Hoop Earrings
products.description: Illuminate your face with the warm hues of the hoop earrings with hearts and pavé. Featuring hand-finished 14k gold plating, these earrings are embellished with sparkling colorless cubic zirconia pavé and micro-beads on the inside and outside of the hoops. The carved hearts on the sides add a romantic and elegant touch. Geometric, sophisticated and versatile, these earrings are perfect both for a simple and everyday look and for a special occasion. Their craftsmanship and attention to detail give the earrings an elegant and refined look. Wear these earrings to brighten up your face and to add a touch of sparkle to your outfit. Elegance and versatility, these pavé heart hoop earrings are sure to be a treasured addition to your jewelry collection.

products.title: Swarovski Attract Round Crystal Earrings
products.description: Extravagant, lustrous and emotive, Swarovski crystal resides in a world of its own. Synonymous with supremely-cut crystal, genuine gemstones and created stones - from the purest and clearest to a spectrum of full, spectacular colour - Swarovski crystal is widely renowned as some of the most beautiful in the world, and since 1892 has endured with its trendsetting design and undying brilliance. Add some sparkle to any outfit with these White Attract Round Rhodium Pierced Earrings. Crafted from rhodium-plated metal, each of these earrings are adorned with a sparkling clear crystal, perfect for adding some timeless appeal to any outfit. White Attract Round Rhodium Pierced Earrings features Designed in Austria. Crafted from rhodium-plated metal. Each earring features a sparkling clear crystal. Beautifully presented in a Swarovski gift box. Diameter 0.5cm.
